summary: This document contains a series of passenger manifests for flights associated with N212JE JEGE, LLC. It lists crew members, passengers, flight times, and other flight-related details for various dates in 2013 and 2014. Notably, several passengers mentioned are linked to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Larry Visoski

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: David Rodgers is mentioned as a crew member alongside Larry Visoski on several flight manifests, indicating his role as co-pilot.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

connections.description: Larry Visoski and David Rodgers are both crew members on the same flights, indicating a professional relationship as pilot and co-pilot.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a passenger on flights piloted by Larry Visoski, indicating a direct relationship during these flights.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a passenger on flights co-piloted by David Rodgers, indicating a direct relationship during these flights.
